Name: TREE
About the game: TREE tells a story of a boy who plants his first tree. And at first, it looks like a little inconsequential act, but with time, a bond develops between the two that will last a lifetime. We are a group of veteran game developers. Perhaps we wanted to get something of our collective chest, or we just simply game jammed together. For each one of us, TREE has a different meaning.
